QuestData.Title: Treasure Hunting Ain't Easy
QuestData.Description:
I can see it yer eyes: Ye got the urge to climb to the top of this here mountain and find out what's on the top!
Us climbers always recognize each other. We won't let any mountain make us feel small, right?
Well, good fer ye I brought plenty of climbing gear. Grab a pack and find a path to the top!
QuestData.LogDescription: Grab the Rock Climbing Gear, then find a handhold and climb to the top of the mountain without losing your grip!
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Tweets Lightsprocket on top of the mountain.
